==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じゅん|ばん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|順|sc=Jpan|tr=jun||order}} + {{m|ja|番|sc=Jpan|tr=ban||numerical order}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じゅんばん}}
# [[order]], [[turn]]

====Derived terms====
* [[順番列]] (''junbanretsu''): (''computing'') sequence
* [[順番検査]] (''junban kensa''): (''computing'') sequence check
* [[順番待ち]] (''junbanmachi''): waiting one's turn
* [[順番付ける]] (''junbanzugeru''): (''computing'') sequence
* [[照合順番]] (''shōgō junban''): (''computing'') collating sequence
* [[論理順番]] (''ronri junban''): (''computing'') sequential logical order
* [[割付け順番]] (''waritsuke junban''): (''computing'') sequential layout order
